scripts.build: bun run src/index.ts --game data/aoe2-game.json --build data/aoe2-scout-build-order.dsl --report out/aoe2-scout-report.html
scripts.build:llm: INCLUDE_LLM=1 bun run src/index.ts --game data/aoe2-game.json --build data/aoe2-scout-build-order.dsl --report out/aoe2-scout-report.html
scripts.sim:aoe2: bun run src/index.ts --game data/aoe2-game.json --build data/aoe2-scout-build-order.dsl --report out/aoe2-scout-report.html
